project.description: simple squawk build, from local directory test-ws.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/lib:/usr/local/lib:/usr/jdk/instances/jdk1.5.0/jre/lib/i386/client:/usr/jdk/instances/jdk1.5.0/jre/lib/i386:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH PATH=/usr/bin:$PATH cd trunk $HUDSON_HOME/bin/verifyBuildJars2
./d.sh clean ./d.sh copyphoneme ./d.sh ./d.sh -prod -mac -o2 rom -metadata cldc imp debugger
./d.sh map -cp:cldc/j2meclasses:imp/j2meclasses:debugger/j2meclasses squawk.suite ./d.sh genspec ./d.sh jvmenv ./d.sh systemproperties ./d.sh Mnemonics ./d.sh OPC ./d.sh OperandStackEffect ./d.sh Verifier ./squawk -h ./squawk -version
$HUDSON_HOME/bin/runsmoketest.sh NATIVE $HUDSON_HOME/bin/runiotests.sh
/usr/bin/rm -rf tempdoc #./d.sh makeapi squawk.suite.api cldc/preprocessed:imp/preprocessed:debugger/preprocessed tempdoc
